name: CFSocketContext
desc: A structure that contains program-defined data and callbacks with which you can configure a CFSocket objectâ€™s behavior.

items.name: init(version: CFIndex, info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, retain: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeRawPointer?)!, release: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Void)!, copyDescription: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?)!)
var copyDescription: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?)!
items.desc: A copy description callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: An arbitrary pointer to program-defined data, which can be associated with the CFSocket object at creation time. This pointer is passed to all the callbacks defined in the context.

items.name: var release: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Void)!
items.desc: A release callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var retain: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeRawPointer?)!
items.desc: A retain callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var version: CFIndex
items.desc: Version number of the structure. Must be 0.
